title: Bollywood Star Sentenced To Prison In Hit-And-Run Case
teaser: A court in Mumbai sentenced Salman Khan to 5 years in prison for a hit-and-run incident in 2002 that left 1 person dead. David Greene talks to commentator Sandip Roy, who lives in Kolkat, India.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
